CustomField.description: The Referral Account of the Referral Contact at the time of the Opportunity. This is so we know at a company level the referrals made, even if the contact changes companies.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Referral Account of the Referral Contact at the time of the Opportunity.
CustomField.label: Referral Account

lookupFilter.infoMessage: Search results exclude records with an end date.
